message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.NE 

The paper discusses optimization of reinforcement learning policies using derivative-free optimization and evolutionary strategies, which are commonly studied in the machine learning and artificial intelligence communities (cs.LG, cs.AI). The paper also proposes methods for handling noise in the rewards and dynamics of the environment, which is a common problem in robotics and control applications (cs.RO, cs.SY). Finally, the paper uses regularized regression-based gradient estimation, which is a common technique in neural network optimization (cs.NE).
